EuclideanFunction Class Reference

Implements the Euclidean distance function for continuous attributes. More...

Detailed Description

Implements the Euclidean distance function for continuous attributes.

This is an implementation of the DistanceFunction abstract class for continuous attributes. It implements the Euclidean distance.

Computes the distance between two attribute values.

Parameters:

att2 is the value of attribute 2.
Returns:
